NewsItem.HEADLINE: IoT 2018 Expert Insight 3 (PDF)
NewsItem.SUMMARY: This report examines the rapid cadence of standards changes in Cellular IoT and illustrates how the IoT market needs a different cadence.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: The IoT market is compared to the smartphone market in terms of driving forces and basic economics. We evaluate the preferences of enterprise IoT customers for longevity of technology and product life cycles.
